titleStmt.title: The loyal garland containing choice songs and sonnets of our late unhappy revolutions, very delightful and profitable, both to this present, and future ages / published by S.N. a lover of mirth.
titleStmt.author: S. M.
S. N., lover of mirth.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Johnson, for T. Passenger ...,

notesStmt.note: Wing (2nd ed.) attributes this work to S. M.
Imprint date contains broken type; completion of date supplied from Wing (2nd ed.).
This item appears at reel 643:15 as Wing N70 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and at reel 1746:1 as Wing (2nd ed.) M79B.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
